text: “Do not judge so that you will not be judged.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2917" class="">standard</st> you <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> you will be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3358" class="">measure</st> you <st data-num="3354" class="">use</st> will <st data-num="03354">be the measure</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> receive.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st><n id="1" /> do you <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2595" class="">speck</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">fail</st> to <st data-num="2657">see</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="1385" class="">beam of wood</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> own?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> can you <st data-num="3004">say</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>, ‘<st data-num="863" class="">Let</st> me <st data-num="1544" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2595" class="">speck</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye,’</st> <st data-num="2532">while</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">there</st> is a <st data-num="1385" class="">beam</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> own?

You <st data-num="5273" class="">hypocrite</st>! <st data-num="4413">First</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1385" class="">beam</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> own <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> you can <st data-num="1227">see clearly</st> to <st data-num="1544" class="">remove</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="2595" class="">speck</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80">brother’s</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>.
Do not give what is holy to dogs or throw your pearls before pigs; otherwise they will trample them under their feet and turn around and tear you to pieces.
“Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="3588">who</st> <st data-num="154" class="">asks</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">receives</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588">the one who</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seeks</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">finds</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="3588">one who</st> <st data-num="2925" class="">knocks</st>, the door will be <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>.

<st data-num="1510">Is</st><n id="1" /> there <st data-num="5101">anyone</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st>, if <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="154">asks for</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>, will <st data-num="1929" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st>?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> if he <st data-num="154">asks for</st> a <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st>, will <st data-num="1929" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="3789" class="">snake</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>, although <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> how to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good gifts</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>, <st data-num="4214">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> will <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="18">good gifts</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="3588">those who</st> <st data-num="154" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!
In everything, treat others as you would want them to treat you, for this fulfills the law and the prophets.
“Enter through the narrow gate because the gate is wide and the way is spacious that leads to destruction, and there are many who enter through it.
How narrow is the gate and difficult the way that leads to life, and there are few who find it!
“Watch out for false prophets, who come to you in sheep’s clothing but inwardly are voracious wolves.

You will <st data-num="1921" class="">recognize</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>. <st data-num="4718" class="">Grapes</st> are <st data-num="3385" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4816" class="">gathered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4810" class="">figs</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5146" class="">thistles</st>, are they?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3779">In the same way</st>, <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">bears</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">bad</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">bears</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">bad</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>.

A <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">bear</st> <st data-num="4190">bad</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> a <st data-num="4550" class="">bad</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">bear</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st> that does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">bear</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> is <st data-num="1581">cut down</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="906" class="">thrown</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>.
So then, you will recognize them by their fruit.
“Not everyone who says to me, ‘Lord, Lord,’ will enter into the kingdom of heaven—only the one who does the will of my Father in heaven.

<st data-num="1722" class="">On</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> will <st data-num="2046" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="1473">me</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">‘Lord</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="3756">didn’t</st> we <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st> in <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1544">cast out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> in <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="1411">powerful deeds</st> in <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name?’</st><n id="1" />
Then I will declare to them, ‘I never knew you. Go away from me, you lawbreakers!’
“Everyone who hears these words of mine and does them is like a wise man who built his house on rock.

<st data-num="3588" class="">The</st> <st data-num="1028" class="">rain</st> <st data-num="2597" class="">fell</st>, <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4215" class="">flood</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="417" class="">winds</st> <st data-num="4363">beat against</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">it</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4098" class="">collapse</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> its <st data-num="2311">foundation had been laid</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">Everyone</st> <st data-num="3588">who</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="1473">mine</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> is <st data-num="3666" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3474" class="">foolish</st> <st data-num="435" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">built</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="285" class="">sand</st>.
The rain fell, the flood came, and the winds beat against that house, and it collapsed—it was utterly destroyed!”
When Jesus finished saying these things, the crowds were amazed by his teaching,
because he taught them like one who had authority, not like their experts in the law.
